titles: Poems to the memory of that incomparable poet Edmond Waller Esquire by several hands.
author: Rymer, Thomas, 1641-1713.
Behn, Aphra, 1640-1689.
Cotton, John, Sir, 1621-1701.
publisher: Printed for Joseph Knight, and Francis Saunders ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
First poem signed: Sir John Cotton, bar., other contributors include Thomas Rymer and Aphra Behn.
